subject: Lease Expiring in {{daysRemaining}} Days: {{propertyName}} - {{unitIdentifier}}
text: Hello {{recipientName}}, Your lease for {{propertyName}} - {{unitIdentifier}} at {{propertyAddress}} will expire in {{daysRemaining}} days on {{leaseEndDate}}. Please decide whether you would like to renew your lease or move out by {{decisionDeadline}}.
